name: Gundam City Defense
description:
Gundam City Defense is a small FPS/Tower Defense game where you defend a city from Exploding Vans, Drones, Helicopters, Boats and Gundams. Armed with a minigun and engineering wit, you can place turrets all over the city to defend your home base from the incoming waves.

The game was inspired by the SEGA classic arcade games of the 90's, and features custom made Genesis/Mega Drive style music.

Turret Details:

  • Bullet Turrets
  • Slowdown Turrets
  • Turrets can be pushed around after placement
  • Turrets can be destroyed by enemy fire and explosives
  • Get Kills to receive Credits in order to buy more Turrets
  • Place Turrets by looking at the spot where you want them

Normal Mode:

  • 50 Waves 
  • Boss units (Helicopters, Boats and Gundams)

Infinite Mode:

  • Infinite waves
  • No Boss units
  • (Warning) May become CPU intensive.

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • Mouse for looking
  • LMB to fire minigun
  • E to place Bullets Turret
  • Q to place Slowdown Turret
  • Space for jump
  • Esc for menu

This game was made within one month as a challenge for myself to make a fun little game within time constraints. I personally felt that asking money for this is wrong. Should you wish to support me, then you can choose what price you'd prefer when downloading (default is 0) or directly send a donation to my PayPal at jgvrystaat@gmail.com. 

Thanks for checking it out and please enjoy! 

*Note that while the game is available for both Windows and Mac, the build could not be tested on an actual Mac computer.
